channel.title: Knights! Standard RuneScape with my personal perspective!
channel.description:
Hello. I decided today that my dreams should come true. I wanted to make a server based around knights and the roleplaying of that time period. This is based off of my 2006 Remake so there are MANY features in it including 100% functional canoes, all skills, etc.
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/28cldur.png[/img]
Not the most creative server as of now but hopefully soon it will be!
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/153wu45.png[/img]
Example of 2h baxe
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2hnb3ad.png[/img]
I personally think that the over the shoulder gmaul looks kick-ass
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2naqqs5.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/14iis03.png[/img]
Example of the stats
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2m6q15s.png[/img]
[size=16pt]Types of characters you can start out as, Misthalin Knight ( start in Lumbridge and are neutral to Varrock and Al Kharid. You can also begin as an Asgarnian Knight (start in Falador and are neutral to Rimmington and Barbarian Village. You could also choose to be a FreeLance knight, basically are not neutral to anyone and you must gather your own supplies and craft your own equipment. Final choice: if thou choose none of the above, you may still become a surf or peasant and live under any of the Kingdoms, peasants can migrate and change the kingdom they are loyal to as they wish.[/size]
Finished Full World PvP and MultiCombat.
UNDER THIS: Can't attack someone from same kingdom. These knights are both from Misthalin
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2w4xmpf.png[/img]
UNDER THIS: Can attack someone from another kingdom.
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2jagtv4.png[/img]
UNDER THIS: Other player from opposite kingdom can fight back.
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/n1dkxl.png[/img]
UNDER THIS: YAY!! Added Combat Level display, which actually does correspond with the combat levels you may attack! This took a bit cuz of the math and some method issues.
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/qsw18m.png[/img]
UNDER THIS: Can attack people within combat level range.
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/288pgdu.png[/img]
UNDER THIS: Peasant outfit (every player gets this, however if you choose to be a peasant these are your clothes.
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/334r9mc.png[/img]
UNDER THIS: The low ranking knight outfit. If you choose to be part of a specific kingdom, you will get this, the amulet depends on the kingdom. Strength amulet for Asgarnia, Magic Amulet for Misthalin. Used to help players.
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2ll268m.png[/img]
UNDER THIS: If you choose to be freelance, this is the outfit you get lol. Although if you do choose to be freelance, you get five exp lamps, while other knights do not.
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2uxyzgy.png[/img]
UNDER THIS: ****Credits to "arham 4" for the idea! The server now has random messages when you click on a knight of the same kingdom.
I also added on top of arham 4's idea. I made it so that when you click on a knight of the same kingdom, you do the "No" emote too!
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/jszzpj.png[/img]
UNDER THIS: Added safe zones. (finally got pics =]) also added the "Safe" sign when you are in a safe zone.
FALADOR:
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/vr3nzb.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/xdcu8n.png[/img]
LUMBRIDGE:
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2mod1lv.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/mwy3yr.png[/img]
Things left to do:
Safe Zones Fully Complete Shops and Npcs Non-Aggressive npcs (right now since the entire world is considered the wilderness, all npcs are aggressive. This is a mandatory fix)
Possible Ideas:
Npcs will be aggressive if you are hostile to their main Kingdom.
When a player kills another player, they receive a knight's commendation token as a drop. They may collect these and use them to purchase better armour, weapons, and exp lamps.
Possibly give titles to players. Ex: [color=maroon]Grandmaster-Knight[/color] [color=black]Docent[/color]
Thank you for reading. Leave a comment if you would like. Tell me how you think it is. DONT be mean.

Lol you can decompile class files to java files.

And what you would recieve are files similar to the ones in clients.
[/quote]
Not really. Thats because those are obfuscated.

But why would I vandalize this if I have my own server to take care of.

@ Docent - If only you had skype…[/quote]

No biggy, the forum has PMing

item.title: Knights! Standard RuneScape with my personal perspective!
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:102, topic:529199”][quote author=Docent link=topic=647956.msg4374618#msg4374618 date=1381713096]

Haha really? Well if you can find someone to host it, ill be more than happy to let them.

I can host it on my VPS! On port 5555.

You cant do 43594?

No since World 901 is hosted on that!

Oh. Well ok then what do you need to host it?
[/quote]
Just you can give me the source (without java files if you are worried).

Just a warning though, the server might be slow at one point as my server I think uses a lot of memory (I’m working on fixing this).[/quote]

Alright give me till maybe between tonight and wednesday to get it ready and then Ill be more than happy to hand it to you

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @King_JC King JC
item.description:
@King_JC wrote:

Get a part time job or do some work online doing surveys, and save up £30 for a month’s VPS/hosting.

You could even get shared hosting if you’re that desperate, but I wouldn’t recommend.

Read full topic
